snippet: Dominic Thiem, 20, uses Facebook to keep a diligent diary of his U.S. Open matches and to reflect on his ‘mega’ experiences.
lead_paragraph: Dominic Thiem, 20, uses Facebook to keep a diligent diary of his U.S. Open matches and to reflect on his ‘mega’ experiences.

headline.main: Austria’s Dominic Thiem Dissects His Tennis Game on Social Media
headline.print_headline: Austria’s Dominic Thiem Dissects His Tennis Game on Social Media
